english.segment1: . Lord of every age. Author of our faith. The first, the last, the same. The name above all names
english.segment2: Crowned in majesty. Glorious Prince of Peace. Throned at God's right hand. The world at His command. The world at His command
english.segment3: Jesus, Lamb of God. How great You are. There is no other Saviour. Every knee bows down. At Your renown. There is no other Saviour
english.segment4: Merciful High Priest. Lover of the least. Generous and meek. Protector of the weak
english.segment5: Sacrificed to death. For us, Your final breath. You died, the world to save. To overcome the grave. To overcome the grave
english.segment6: You will reign forever. You reign forever
